author: Special Correspondent
title: Dashboard launched to share COVID-19 details
description: The Department of Revenue and Disaster Management has opened a dashboard to share official data regarding COVID-19 in the Union Territory.Public can access the dashboard on the website https://covid19
content:
The Department of Revenue and Disaster Management has opened a dashboard to share official data regarding COVID-19 in the Union Territory.
Public can access the dashboard on the website https://covid19dashboard.py.gov.in to get information related to COVID-1… [+353 chars]
